events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I want to know the next steps.
The system has identified the issue as related to a refund request based on the customer's message.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue?
Could you please share the reason you'd like a refund and any photos if the product is defective or not as described?
The product arrived on time but it was completely different from the description. The material feels cheap and I don't want to keep it.
We can proceed with the refund. Please return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will send, and we will process your refund once we receive it.
Thank you for the quick reply. I appreciate the prepaid label offer and will send the item back today.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and you confirmed satisfaction, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
